title: Jared Allen is a monster!
author: VD
content_html: The Vikings season may be over, but they’re not quitting. Allen has three sacks already and there’s still four minutes left in the third quarter… he only needs one more to break Strahan’s Favre-assisted NFL record. And Dan Marino could take some lessons from Chris Doleman, the former Vikings record-holder. I always liked Doleman back in his day and he looked downright delighted to see Allen bringing down McCoy.
content_text:
The Vikings season may be over, but they’re not quitting.  Allen has three sacks already and there’s still four minutes left in the third quarter… he only needs one more to break Strahan’s Favre-assisted NFL record.  And Dan Marino could take some lessons from Chris Doleman, the former Vikings record-holder.  I always liked Doleman back in his day and he looked downright
delighted
to see Allen bringing down McCoy.
